website_summaries.verdict: A powerful precision nail drill capable of going up to 30,000 RPM. Durable and strong enough to remove even acrylic dips.
pros: Offers variable speeds between 0 and 30,000 rpm, with forward and reverse options
Foot switch included for hands-free control
Very easy to operate and maintain
Comes with three drill bits to get you started
cons: Some users report the machine overheating in rare cases

customer_reviews.title: Burned on the inside less than 3 months of infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: Top of case started melting and machine stopped working less than 3 months into using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazony711

customer_reviews.title: 10 year nail technician
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional nail technician have been using this drill for around 3 months constantly. It holds up well with no vibration. For the price, I would definitely recommend it. I had a Kupa and this one has held up much better. For being a 10 year nail tech, I couldn't be happier with the choice to buy this nail drill. I use the manual speed control without the foot pedal. The speed control is enough for anyone wanting to do nails full time.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these based on the reviews and three months later none of them work! Trash! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kay star

customer_reviews.title: electrical safety hazard (overheats)
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of minutes of use, both hand-held tool and power box - overheats. It's been over a month of back-and-forth correspondence with the company (Makartt) without getting anywhere. Makartt did not honor my request for a replacement or offer me a refund. Disgusted and patience lost.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Perfect Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product came exactly as described. The drill is very quiet which I love. There isn't a lot of vibration like other drills. It was nearly packaged & it came with thorough instructions. I love this drill. & I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The drill doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely furious, i purchased this item in the spare of the moment after much consideration and after looking at a ton of reviews. I gave the product 1 star because it arrived on time however I had clients today and to my surprise the drill doesn’t work. It also looks as if someone returned it before because there are spots and spill stains as if someone spilled product on the machine prior to me opening the box. I would like the actual drill that i paid for ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased September 2017 for personal use. I tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased September 2017 for personal use. I tried to use it the other day and it wouldn't turn on. The unit burned with so little use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, excellent price and value. Ease of use & convenient.
customer_reviews.text: In one word AMAZING! I have been a professional nail tech for over 20 years and have had several drills over the years, some VERY expensive and some cheep. This one is wonderful for the price. Great quality, good power, very user friendly and ease of use, minimal vibration. Comes with directions (for new people). This machine does NOT come with a bunch of extra crap, just motor, drill, foot peddle, drill holster and a couple bits. If you don't have sand paper bits you will need to get those. I'm not sure how well this machine will hold up to continual use or longevity, but I'm hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Starr

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! I used this machine twice. No more than 10 mins at a time. I tried to use it again a week later and it would not turn on. The light came on, but the machine would not start. It also didn't come with the foot pedal. Returned just in time.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great nail drill but cheap drill bits.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a higher rating if drill bits were better quality. Works great if you want an inexpensive nail drill. Only drawback are the drill bits. They weren't the best quality...rather poor, so buy some drill bits with product. Foot petal is a cheap plastic. I didn't use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi Sanderlin

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: As a nail tech for over 20 years, this is by far the best e-file I've used. It's comparable and can compete with any professional e-file out there at a fraction of the purchase price. It's quiet but has the power to file through the toughest acrylics and gels while also being easy to adjust for gentler filing. The handpiece is stable and comfortable to hold. There isn't the slightest wobble even at higher speeds. The only time it might grabs or drag is when the speed is set too low. I can't comment on the included bits because I use my own favorite ceramic bits. After two months of regular use, I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dianalynn

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally good buy
customer_reviews.text: Updated review - Had to knock off two stars because the foot pedal stopped working after a month or so. Other than that, I'm still happy with the operation of the e-file. This is my initial review. Great e-file. Very compact, extremely quiet, and virtually no vibration. Works better than any other low cost e-file I've used. I'll review again in a couple of months. About Me: Licensed barber/stylist, nail technician, and make-up artist since 1984.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Open your package right away to make sure you have everything.
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault that I bought it in March but did not decide to use it until July. I never open the box until now because I was waiting to get all of the tools I need to start doing my nails on my own but, I should have made sure all the parts were in the box I had everything except the wand which is the most important tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: So my boyfriend bought me this drill for Valentine’s Day and i fell in love with it it was working great and getting the job done then one day poof it blew out on me and i used it maybe 5 times very disappointing smh 1 month i had it and it stops working out of no where and the embarrassing part is i had a client who i had to reschedule cuz my drill shot out ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Patrishia

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drill for home use. This drill it’s very useful for home use. I haven’t expressed any heat. I only use it every 2 to 3 weeks. It’s very powerful, lite weight, and inexpensive. Compare to other drills. Very good quality. Previously I had a 60$ drill it was very noisy, heavy, and drill bit used to jump. I am fascinated with this drill excellent. Best drill ever. For some reason the reverse button stopped working 😔😔 and I had no other choice and return it. But I still love the drill. How powerful it’s and very lite weight. I got end up ordering the same drill from another website and al a lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Drill Dies after 2 Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that after using this product only twice it cut off during mid-filing session and would NOT power back on! Sending back for my full refund. No trouble-shooting steps or contact info provided in order to try to revive this thing.
customer_reviews.author: A Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a month. Please replace.
customer_reviews.text: Drill broke just after a month of getting it. Will update review once company speaks to me and can replace the one that is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Was great til it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved loved loved this drill for the time that it worked. I had it for about 3 1/2 months then it completely died/ stopped working. I am a professional nail tech and bought it initially for home use but because of how much I loved how it worked I then took it to my work place salon. After 3 months of use it completely stopped working. I tried to figure out what was wrong but with no success considered it a loss. Boo. Basically you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Galdina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I took forever to find a machine that suited my needs, and had good reviews. (I got into the Acrylic Dip hobby about a year ago, using a cheapo KISS eFile.) I finally caved on the little beauty and I’m so glad I did! It’s small, but powerful. Super quiet, and the handheld doesn’t vibrate in my hand while I use it, or on the hand I’m using it on. I don’t use the foot pedal, but it’s nice that I came with one. Holder is nice, and extra attachments are a huge plus. I’m still learning how to perfect my skills, but this is the tool to do it with!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My drill is defective and not turning on. Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order today and it does not want to turn on. I’m extremely disappointed and would like the seller to contact me about sending me a new one as mine is defected. I’ve been wating to get a new drill for ages and now that I have one I have to have clients wait because it’s broken. Very unhappy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Majella Adeniran

customer_reviews.title: It won't work when I turn it back on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last May and haven't used it since that first month. Now it stopped working when I turned it back on. So the product only works for a couple of times at first? This is a total waste of money. After this review, they automatically sent me a new one, which is a very nice of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DLe

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for manicures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool to do gel nails. This tool is great and easy to use. The attachments that come with it are great and I like how I can adjust the speed. I use the foot pedal which is super convenient. It does get hot after a lot of work, Not a problem for the machine itself but for the person you are doing the nails on. They let me know when it gets it and we take a break from using that tool. Not a problem, just understand anything will get hot with long periods of use.
customer_reviews.author: mark cain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drill for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: A++++++ amazing product!!!! It works really good!!!! The hand piece is light weight and very easy to maneuver. Will most definitely be buying more Makartt products!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product!! Wish it came with better drill bits
customer_reviews.text: So so Happy I order this!! Just wish the bits would have been a bit better quality. We all here about Markatt if you know anything about nail product lines. I was wishful that the bits wouldn't be as bad as other reviewers as said but unfortunately they were so now I have to order another set of bits but the ones that comes with it. Will allow you create a full set of nails but it will take a little longer than with a good set of bits would.
customer_reviews.author: David & Chaia Kloster

customer_reviews.title: Does get warm
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but only had it on for 20 min and it already started to get warm. I wonder how long it will last or if it will melt if I did a whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already broke, Manufacturer's number goes straight to voicemail
customer_reviews.text: Not even 4 months in, the drill is no longer working. I saw they advertise 6 month warranty and called Amazon. They gave me the phone number for the manufacturer but it goes straight to voicemail
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Negative Star One
customer_reviews.text: If I could give an negative star I would!! I’m beyond disappointed about this drill. I needed an drill and I wanted an good one but this was NOT IT!! I read countless reviews about this drill before I bought it. I had it’s less then a month and only used it three times... before it’s STOP WORKING. This was an big purchase for me ; it’s complete stop working and I’m completely sad but mad ass hell! Don’t waste your money on this, please keep scrolling by!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Start slow!
customer_reviews.text: I generally get my nails done, but it is so expensive so I decided to try it on my own. This tool works as advertised, but you need to know what you’re doing. It looks easy at the nail salon, but it definitely wasn’t for me. Trying to find the speed that will get off your previous shellac or gel coat without also burning your nail was a challenge. By the end of my second hand I was starting to get the hang of it, but my first hand I went with too much speed too fast so the tip of my nail was very frail. My recommendation is to start on a slow speed and work your way up.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great E-Drill!
customer_reviews.text: I found it very easy to use (especially since this was my first time), with a quiet, vibration free motor, lightweight handle, and I like the fact that all the cords plug into the front of the drill, and I love the foot pedal, too. My nails are smooth and shaped with no 'flat spots' like I have when I manually file them. A great experience and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Two features didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I put together this unit but controls for the pedal and for the 'foot' mode did not work. Otherwise, the item operated as expected. I'm returning it because it is defective. In the reviews here, I read that customer service is very responsive. I'll come back if my experience of return and refund doesn't happen as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Marganne Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't working
customer_reviews.text: Such an lovely view... and the product is not working... I waisted my money on this sh*t !!!!! So disappointed... and I can't contact seller or anything.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this drill
customer_reviews.text: I was really nervous buying this product because it costs a pretty penny however I am really impressed with drill. I’m new to doing my nails but I feel like a pro because of this high quality product. I’ve read reviews that it breaks after a couple of months and so far so good. I’m very happy with this drill. I can adjust the speed which is the best part of using the drill.
customer_reviews.author: M. Everson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with bits as promised and the foot pedal doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the bits that were supposed to come with the machine and drill were not included. Then on top of that when I went to plug in the foot pedal and use that as I would I my drills at work...it didn’t budge. If I wanted an automatic drill only I would’ve bought a different drill. The option between manual and automatic was the reason I chose this drill in the first place. I feel very bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a efile similar to this one about 6 years ago. The hand held portion never worked right as I couldn't change drill bits. I saw a review from a YouTube I fluencer and she had rave reviews. I purchased it and have zero regrets. Lightweight yet powerful. Change file buts very easily and has minimal to zero vibration. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and yet powerful drill
customer_reviews.text: This drill is very quiet and actually pretty powerful in my opinion. I don’t even need to use it on the highest power setting because that would be too much. I watched a YouTube video of a professional nail technician who was trying 3 different electric nail files she purchased through Amazon for beginners and non-professionals. This was the best one in her opinion so I went with it and I really like it so I’m grateful I saw her review of it!
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: 3 months drill
customer_reviews.text: Loved the drill untill it stopped working only after 3 months. Used it about a good 15 times. It is low noise and easy to use but I will not Purchase again if it only last under a year. UPDATE! So after leaving it alone for 2 days, I plugged it in again and turned all the switches on and off and it started working again. Hopefully I won’t have any more issues but the seller was very kind with getting in contact with me about sending me another one. Im glad I double checked before getting rid of it. This drill is definitely a starter drill.
customer_reviews.author: Tivona Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I've heard so many great things about this nail dril
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it didn't work. It was defective. I've heard so many great things about this nail dril. I'll re order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Quit working while with a new client
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I don’t recommend ...... this is why! It’s a great drill ! Don’t get me wrong I want another one bc I’m used to it but 60 dollars for something to keep burning out I wAs in the middle of working on a client and had to cancel all my clients for the next few weeks .... I’m extremely upset and I don’t know another drill to get at the moment ....
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Very good but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I loved the drill when I first got it. However I only used it about 3 to 4 times and now it won’t work. I haven’t dropped it, misused it, missed handled it, left it on or anything and it just cuts on but doesn’t work. The drill doesn’t drill. It’s very frustrating because I was so happy to have and now it doesn’t work. I know longer have ya box it came in. So I can’t return it. I basically wasted my money. Is there something that can be done. I don’t even want my money back I just want a new one.
customer_reviews.author: tatyanne lecount

customer_reviews.title: The attachments are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is great but the attachments are terrible. The buffers do the job but the 4 little metal adjustments are no good at all.
customer_reviews.author: marianna

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for more than one set.
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because I bought this machine 45 days ago ( August 15) and yesterday October 4th stopped working. I notice that when I was working with it the machine got hot quickly but didn’t bother me since I use gloves, last week it was hot after one set, I not even can do my second set because burned my fingers! So finally yesterday stopped working! It’s a pity because I liked this drill and it looked strong. I called amazon and they refunded me and I send the machine back.
customer_reviews.author: Dixibel Ferreras

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have no experience with no drills, but this one has proven quite easy to use for beginners. It works well whether you’re using the foot pedal (my preference), or just the drill. I wish the bits came with one that has thicker teeth, or grooves to grind down acrylic and gel faster. The files it came with will get the job done, but it takes a little longer. I notice that when you have the power (torque) turned up to a midway point, the drill becomes harder to control and it slips off the nail, which is not good, especially when you’re trying to shape the nail. Overall. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Angella Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I brought this drill June 28th, 2020 and received it on June 30th it started out working just fine then started on September 1st not working then 2 days later started working again this is so beyond frustrating now it has completely went out and is not working. I really want my money back I would not recommending buying this drill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product Waiting for warranty
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say I would of gone to the company first before leaving a 1 However, I cannot find their customer help. I bought this in March, we went on Covid for two months. So it had not even been used until the beginning of August. It was used five times and completely stopped working. This tool was not ever used for acrylics. Only for buffing down gel polish. Take heed and watch this review. Because if they do not replace it one only used five times and under their warranty time this is definitely a NO GO BUY. I Will report back if they do the right thing
customer_reviews.author: Celeste H.

customer_reviews.title: Totally would buy this again amazing
customer_reviews.text: This has some really slow speeds really high speeds pretty amazing little tool I love the foot pedal control I actually use this on my dog's because it moves at a slower speed if you do buy one keep in mind you have to twist harder than you think to release the chuck cuz there's a catch point you got to get past I did not see that in the instructions but this is a really awesome tool,I also love how quick and easy it is to remove the bits in the change from one to another.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This machine was so much better than I even thought it would be. It had control speeds so you dont end up sanding too much too quickly or messing up your cuticles. Id recommend for those who want to take their time and learn the product, not for those in a rush who aren't already skilled as a nail tech.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hall

customer_reviews.title: Get it ! Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: After spending two weeks reviewing all different drills from $20-$500 drills this was the one that I saw is the best and it is definitely a professional grade and I will buy another one when does one stops working if it ever does because I was able to get the awesome warrantee and it is just a great drill all around you don’t feel any of that electricity tingling is it spends completely even and the company also sells drill bits that you can get to go with it which are amazing video on YouTube by Ashley Price follow me @beautybyher1 for pictures and videos!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully other customers will more lucky than me!
customer_reviews.text: I was so exciting to get it, I start to use it ASAP but since first time it didn’t work correctly , I spend about 10-15 min just to turn it on!!! Than it worked perfectly till I turn it off. I thought maybe it’s my fault that I didn’t know how to turn it on but it happened every time! I had to spend 10-20 min To turn on/turn off before it finally starts to work!! I am disappointed !! Speacilly cause it happened when I had customers !! Wasted my time !
customer_reviews.author: Diliara

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Received the Makartt Nail Drill Electric Nail File Machine JD700 today and have already tried it out...I had originally ordered a hand held portable one (AIRSEE Portable Electric Nail Drill Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit), although found this one after I ordered the other. I cancelled that one in time to order this one. Spending a little more, though IMO it was worth it. I am so happy that I did and am impressed. Runs smooth with no wobble what so ever and is really quiet. I will update ever few months to see how it does over time...first impressions is definitely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Effective tool at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this e-file as a beginner to use on Builder gel nails 1/5 years ago. It has been a real trooper. It's important to learn about bits- which one does what - but this thing is a dang tank that will perform just as well as some of the much more expensive e-files. The only drawback is the cord that attaches the handpiece, I wish it was a little longer. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a strong quality e-file at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: elfroggo

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 large dogs and I do their nails myself, taking them to the groomers every other week is not affordable for me. I used to use a dremel but the loud noise scared them. This is much more quiet, not as big and bulky and easier to use and works great. May not be what it's made for but it's what I use it for and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have fallin in love with this e file ! It’s quick and easy to clean up light weight if it were to break on my own doing i could easily buy another with out breaking the bank Came with extra drillbit pieces and file attachments a footpedal and it also has options for forward and backwards and if you want to use the hand setting or the footpedal setting
customer_reviews.author: Destiny hayes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nail drill after taking a nail decorating class. I was a little intimidated at first, never having used the drill before. The set up was easy, just plug it in. The drill fit in my hand nicely. I did a fill on my nieces nails and I found it took a bit more pressure to remove gel from acrylic nails. I used less pressure when removing gel from my dtrs nails done by me. Maybe product, or technique. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October, but I was too scared to use it right away. I don’t do anyone else’s nails, just my own. I began using this for only the third time tonight, and the motor just died mid-mani. I was finally starting to get the hang of it, but now I’m just so sad! **UPDATE** -1 star I contacted the company since there's supposed to be a warranty on the device, but they keep asking for the same information over and over when I've already provided it 5 times! So frustrating! Don't waste your money, just get a different drill.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional and my 14 year old daughter and I used this drill with such ease! I love the option of using foot pedal or just by hand and the easy speed change settings. I did purchase other drill bits as well. Love LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Mi Hyon Cho

customer_reviews.title: It's very helpful, no need to get expensive mani done anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine. It's very easy to operate. It's extremely powerful and serves it;'s purpose. I have never used nail drill before in my entire life, I am not a pro, but I think my my forst attempt on working on my own nails was a success.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Works great! If I had to suggest one change it ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was two days late but the product itself delivered. It has the power and functions that I want and need to do my own nails. Everything is included as well. The only "problem" I had was you actually have to twist the lower silver section of the handle to release the bit and put in a new one. Initially I was just twisting the middle purple part. Works great! If I had to suggest one change it would be to not coil the cord and leave the cord straight and loose. But other than that it still deserves 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Deana E. Bossio

customer_reviews.title: Overheats and smokes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a beginner machine. It worked well a few times. Today out of nowhere it started smoking and overheating. Though she rarely used it. Very dissappointed. Too expensive for such short use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I spent days reading reviews in order to make a good decision on which one to purchase. I finally settled on this one and it has worked really well for me. It's easy to use, works well and has not overheated for me yet. It came with a lot of tips which was also helpful. I use it on my regular nails as well as acrylic and makes manicuring a lot easier. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional nail tech I only do mine and a couple of friends here and there. That being said I didn’t use this drill every day and yet it still stopped working properly only after 6 months of purchasing it. Before it broke it was an amazing machine and I loved it. But then suddenly when I would switch the direction to reverse it does not do anything at all. No movement, nothing! Very disappointed and upset. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: em123

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Drill Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this nail drill. It was cheap and it did its job right, compared to the cheaper, unreliable ones I’ve bought before because I’m a college student on a budget. Really love it!! The quality is so good 😊 I’m a beginner and it was really easy to use and I love that you are able to adjust the settings. The drill bits are nice too. Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO much better than my original efile!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the efile I had was good, this one is AMAZING! It doesn't get bogged down or stop, even with pressure and at a lower speed, and it's so quiet! Plus my old one would make my hands numb from the vibration, I thought it was a normal thing. This one has ZERO vibration. And it comes with actual ceramic bits, not the cheap-ass crappy ones you get with other efiles.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: 220v/110v system
customer_reviews.text: Too weak Also, We live in Israel and got 110v machine. We had to connect through a transformer. We did have to sign we need 220v and we didn’t notice it, but it wasn’t one of rhe questions on the procedure of ordering. When you send an electric product to a country with 220v system you should ask the question.
customer_reviews.author: Dovev Gibori

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’m a rookie nail tech and this machine is awesome but I had to give it four stars because I just wish that the level 1 and 2 would actually work properly cuz it goes straight to level three which makes it a bit harder for me to master the technique.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this. I was using a super cheap drill and this bad boy puts it to shame. It's great, low vibration and easy to use. The bits that came with it were pretty good. Usually the starter bits are garbage, but I really like the ceramic bit.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Runs smooth, worth it, great affordable middle option
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried to buy because many negative reviews mentioned how it stopped working after a while. I'm a nail tech and took the leap cause I really wanted to try this out. It runs really smooth and has lasted me until now (about 6 months). This is a great affordable option! Only thing was that the little plastic covering the slider that controls speed came off but you can just put it right back without any issues (or use it without it).
customer_reviews.author: Liana Feng

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Changed my whole life. Me and my daughter do our nails and this is a lifesaver! It’s easy... and we haven’t been at a nails salon since. Learn to do your nails and buy this.... so satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Anitra r.

customer_reviews.title: Like Butta
customer_reviews.text: So I’m a beginner and wanted a drill that wouldn’t break my pockets starting out it’s very sturdy and easy to hold. No vibrations. I just wish it came with more bits. And a but holder. Over all I love my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Darma

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I made this far!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. Before purchasing I read many of the reviews and followed the directions of one customer stating run the machine on different settings before using. Best advice Ihabe ever received in reviews! Again this machine is just as good as the ones they use in the nail shop. I have been back to a nail shop since I purchased the nail drill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My drill came perfectly fine with all the pieces. Nothing was damaged and they were in great condition never been used. I was worried that the speed would be too slow but it actually gets really fast and i am a beginner so I’ll be sticking to the lower speed! I was worried about ordering because some people said the machine stopped working after a few months and some even burned...I really hope this doesn’t happen. I’m quite happy with the product and will write an update if I experience anything out of the bloom.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I'm a professional nail tech & this drill is awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional nail tech & this drill is awesome for the price! My long time friend & old coworker sent me the link to order this drill.I did get a call from her that her drill got very hot & melted the plastic. She was at the salon when this happened so lucky for her she unplugged it & nothing happened. My advice is if you buy it make sure you unplug it when your done using it. I'm sure it was just an unfortunate situation but she only had it 3 months before it died
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Griego

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at this item. The drill comes with every bit needed for a perfect manicure, gel polish remover and acrylic/gel full-sets and fill-in. The speed control can be adjusted to min. for beginners and the max. speed is strong enough for professionals. I normally spend $150-$200 a month at the nail salon so doing my own nails is going to be a huge savings.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Might not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and it does not turn on..I'm currently trying to obtain a replacement but that process seems to be difficult..I strongly suggest you do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing e-file 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! I am on my second one because my first randomly stopped working. I have been using the new one fairly regularly since I received it on June 30th and I its just great especially for the price. Sometimes faulty products happen even to the best but not only is this e-file fantastic so is the customer service I received. I emailed them pretty late June 26th which was a wednesday I believe and had a reply the next day. I had to send a video of the 1st e-file showing what was wrong I did again reply the next day(Friday). I had the replacement in my hands that Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: LunaRayne

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a week
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She does her own nails only, this was not used at a salon or for commercial use. From the original date of unboxing, it was used 2 times. She noticed it would get extremely hot to the point where you could not touch it. Then it quit working altogether. DO NOT BUY!!! you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic nail drill!!
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all, used multiple times with great results. I’ve had my natural nails manicured for years & COVID put a stop to that real quick. So, this was nice to use with acrylic powder, dip powder & polygel. I don’t use fake nails but I’m sure it’ll work just fine. Definitely a money saver from the nail salon.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pollum

customer_reviews.title: It works great so fs
customer_reviews.text: So far it works perfectly. Another review in here suggested to run it for 2 hrs the first time in use. I run it for about 50 minutes. I haven't had any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill!!! I'm very pleased with this purchase. I did my research on YouTube and amazon reviews before deciding which drill to buy. I was indecisive between Belle and Makartt. I'm very happy I chose Makartt. I had used it only once and it has no vibration and doesn't heat up so far. The only negative is that its very difficult to remove the sanding band from its bit. Other than that I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews. I have had this efile for only 1.5 months. It died! DO NOT BUY!!!!!! I would leave 0 stars if i could!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first and then doesn't hardly work at all
customer_reviews.text: It worked great at first. I work as a full time nail tech. I bought it in February it's July & all of a sudden it's so slow it'll hardly go through aceylic.
customer_reviews.author: Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet drill perfect for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Im a not professional, just using it for my self and my 19 years old daughter, it is very quiet i can do it while everyone is sleeping with no issue. Another thing I love about this drill ,is Speed goes from very slow, it doent hurt my nails or cuticle. It don't stop when im use it on my daughters artificial nail. I think for the money is perfect little drill. 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Enisa g

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. This was my first time using a nail drill and this system definitely gets the job done! Very easy to use. Keep it on a low setting when starting out. I was able to use it on a low setting and got my gel polish off pretty quickly. I also put it to about half way and was able to take off an acrylic set without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cantin

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great drill for the price, I’ve had mines for a couple of months and I use mines about once a week to file down acrylic and it still works just as good as when it first arrived.
customer_reviews.author: lizbeth de anda

customer_reviews.title: Must Have! Most Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: A little thick to hold and I feel like I have bigger hands than most girls, but otherwise this drill is seriously great. Honestly, amazing value for what you’re getting, it’s extremely strong, you barely have to turn the dial up so be careful, it’s not too noisy, has a tray for the drill to lay in, comes with foot peddle, and the color is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Marie Colosimo

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Great drill! So quite I can even do nails while everyone in the house is asleep! I’m so excited to play with this drill! It came quicker than expected and is an all around great drill. Feel very comfortable in my hand. I just hope it doesn’t stop working on me like some people have mentioned in their reviews! If you’re a beginner and want to be great at nail application this is definitely the drill for you! THANK ME LATER ♥️🤣
customer_reviews.author: Achante Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Quality inconsistent between two of the same machine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for quite some time preofessionally at least 3-4 times a day . It does the job . The drill Hess is a little light compared to others so it take a bit long to drill gel polish off . Mine does not get hit . However ,I bought 2 . One works well while the other one sucks . My coworker is constantly having issues with hers . It heats up so fast and the drill bit grip keeps locking up . —-update Customer service sent a new drill to replace the one that was acting up . It’s working well so far !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: After one use the unit got hot started smoking and stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Carsten Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing my own nails with Kiara Sky Dip Powder and this drill has been perfect. I can control how fast I want it which is my favorite feature because I have really thin sensitive nails.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Have been in the business for 31 years. Needed to replace A drill that I had for many years and this woman works great
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: The excellent electric drill for the professional nail technician.
customer_reviews.text: I work in the nail salon where we have a lot of acrylic nails to do. We have the expensive ones from Japan UP200. However; we need some extra electric drills for other stations. This model is not the best, but it could do almost exactly the same as the expensive one. This one I purchased is the second one. My first one is still running good after a year with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pham

customer_reviews.title: This drill is amazing for beginners. It's so easy to use and came earlier than my expected date.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my drill earlier than the expected shipping date which was very pleasantly unexpected with the situation we are all facing right now. I have just started doing my acrylics at home and this drill was so easy to use and came with all the drill bits I needed to get started. It's a purchase well worth making for sure. I did my research and read hundreds of reviews of different drill choices and I'm so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Powerful enough that it’s scary when you loose grip a little bit. Perfect for beginning nail techs, I use frequently for hours and as it does get a little warm, it works great. I use it on half power. I love that it comes with both the foot pedal ability and the simply handheld!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tahlia H

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several weeks and love it. The foot pedal is awesome and works very well to free up your hands from going back and forth. Great buy and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashly T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been working with the drill for two months now- excellent!! I am no longer paying a nail salon $40.00 +tip! HUGE saving!
customer_reviews.author: justanordinarygyrl

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible! It was functional for only three uses and completely stopped working! And ironically my return window has shut down as of 3days ago so I can’t even get a refund or replacement. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Drill gets way to HOT ! Both handle and unit
customer_reviews.text: Why does my drill get so hot ? Both handle and unit ! This one is my 3rd one I have bought and this one is the last one I purchase and it’s the only one that I don’t want to use because it gets way to HOT CAN I YOU GUYS REPLACE IT AND SEND ME S NEW AND I WILL SEND THIS ONE BACK .. thank you in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Fina Moran

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Video link included!
customer_reviews.text: Looovee this machine! It doesn't get stuck when reshaping the nail, no vibrations, light hand piece, no heat, live the foot pedal, love the silicon stand for the hand piece, perfect size for small work area, electric cord long enough, hand piece cord flexible enough to manage, arrived on time, just get others bit those ones are useless. Here is a video a made as a review!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and cost for product
customer_reviews.text: My wife plugged it in and said it's so fast and quite and loves it so she made me buy two more today. Only cost an 1/8th of her "high priced" piece of garbage she has bought in the past, paying over $400 and taken it back to the shop 4 or 5 times because the wires inside would break off the motor plus it was 10,000 rpm slower than this machine. GOOD QUALITY and GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.author: FEDUP365

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow. My nail tech is moving out of states and I bought this drill so that I could practice on myself. I was amazed at how easy this drill was to use. Very beginner friendly. I used this to remove my acrylic nails. Not like I can go to the nail shop and request a soak off because of quarantine but going forward I will be doing my own nails.
customer_reviews.author: India L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this e-file for 3 months now, and I love it! It’s a great price point and it’s perfect for my nail business. I like the bits it comes with, but I do recommend purchasing larger bits for nail enhancement removal. I love the Pana safety carbide bit. It fits well with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jenkins

product_meta.title: Makartt Nail Drill Electric Nail File Machine JD700 Professional 30000RPM Manicure Drill for Acrylic Nails Remove Gel Polish Poly Nail Extension Gel B-01
feature_bullets: ❤Quiet & Vibration Free Motor: With high precision & high torque, Makartt nail drill adopt Japanese CE Certificate bearings, truly achieve low noise low vibration and low heat. Design with ventilation for reducing the hand piece temperature. Optional speed (0-30000rmp)which is easy to adjust and shows speed signal on the motor. Meet your multiple manicures from a simple trim to remove nail extension gel. (Please note that it fit US plug, 35W, 100V-110V only, can't be used under 220-240V.

❤Makartt JD700 nail drill machine is a collaborative product designed by Makartt and JSDA, in which Makartt is responsible for sales and promotion and JSDA is for manufacturing. It's an authentic product with Makartt quality. Please be assured that the product is under Makartt brand

❤ Easy for Beginners & Home Use: We provide a tutorial video and instruction manual to assist you for use. The twist lock chuck system helps you replace grinding head easily. Suitable for both right &left- handed operators. Get a natural nail prep and remove nail gel quickly. Change your nail shape nail art at any time. Low cost but with salon-quality. Ideal for professional nail salon, studio and home use

❤Multi-functions: Makartt acrylic nail grinder is used for buffering, grinding, sharpening, sanding, polishing for acrylic Nails, remove nail gels, artificial or natural nails and cuticle remover. It can fit for the 3/32 drill bits. 30pcs sanding bands are also included, what's more, we also provide foot pedal function, you can choose hand or foot mode for your convenience

❤Makartt Popular Nail Drills: Makartt JD700 nail drill is launched in 2016 and has been always acclaimed by customers for durable quality and easy operation. With safety report UL 859 & UL1727 tested by ISO 17025 certified laboratory. Accumulated many nail lovers so far. It was upgraded not less than five times to ensure easy use and comfortable experience for you
